snippet: Italy’s Mario Balotelli plays with an uncontrolled fire, at times injuring foes and confounding his coaches. But he also lights up the field.
abstract: Profile of Italian national soccer striker Mario Balotelli, one of the sports’s most gifted and eccentric players; Balotelli plays with an uncontrolled fire, at times injuring foes and confounding his coaches, but he also lights up the field; was key in Italy's win over Germany at the Euro Championship.
lead_paragraph: Italy’s Mario Balotelli plays with an uncontrolled fire, at times injuring foes and confounding his coaches. But he also lights up the field.

headline.seo: Mario Balotelli, One of Soccer’s Most Gifted and Eccentric Players
